import React from 'react'; import data from './data/info'; import Enroll from './Enroll'; const Course = () => { return( <>

Courses

{data.courses.map((course)=>(

{course.stack}

    {course.languages.map((language)=>(
  • {language}
    • ))}
{course.Curriculum}

Description

Duration: {course.duration}

Fee: {course.price}

))}
) } export default Course;
